description: Try our easy to follow Banana Raspberry Nice-Cream With Roasted Almonds recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Banana Raspberry Nice-Cream With Roasted Almonds Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup natural sliced almonds, chopped, roasted

recipeInstructions.text: Place banana slices, raspberries and yoghurt in a food processor. Process for 2 minutes, scraping down the sides of the processor occasionally, or until mixture reaches a smooth and a sorbet-like consistency.
Transfer to a container, cover and freeze overnight until firm. Scoop into serving bowls and top with almonds.
